name: Forge
additional_notices: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
What is the project about?
Forge is a brand new DeFi protocol enabling anyone to mint & trade real-world assets with the convenience of the blockchain.


What makes your project unique?
We aim to provide a simple, understandable mechanic for synthetic assets.


History of your project.

✅
 Forming a competent experienced team in Dapp building and DeFi.

✅
Research and development.

✅
Private testnet launched for internal audits and testing purposes.

✅
Branding for the app and our socials.

✅
 Public testnet launched.

What’s next for your project?

Proper listings, More Oracle feeds , UI UX improvement , VEFORGE token , VeForge Bribe system

What can your token be used for?

Governance and protocol fees and farming.
